    java.util.List<Comment> CommentRepository.findAllByProposalIdOrderByCreationDateDesc​(java.lang.Long proposalId)
    This method is used to find all the comments made on a proposal by the proposal id and sort those proposals on the basis of the creation date in a descending order.

  • Uses of Comment in com.soprabanking.ips.services

    Methods in com.soprabanking.ips.services that return Comment
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Comment CommentService.addComment​(java.lang.String body)
    Creates and returns a new Comment object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal on which the Comment has to be created, id of the User who is making a comment on the given Proposal and, Text of the Comment.
    Methods in com.soprabanking.ips.services that return types with arguments of type Comment
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Comment> CommentService.displayComments​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of Comment objects of a given Proposal in response to the specified Request Body String containing the id value of the Proposal
